url.title: Google Images Search URL
url.description: The Google Images search URL to scrape (e.g., https://www.google.com/search?q=your+search+term&tbm=isch)

maxImages.title: Maximum Images
maxImages.description: Maximum number of images to scrape (default: 50)

delayMin.title: Minimum Delay (ms)
delayMin.description: Minimum delay between requests in milliseconds (default: 5000)

delayMax.title: Maximum Delay (ms)
delayMax.description: Maximum delay between requests in milliseconds (default: 15000)

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Maximum Requests Per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests per crawl session (default: 100)
